parsedData.name: Jacob Kotzee
parsedData.title: Frontend Software Engineer

contact.location: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa

parsedData.summary:
Frontend Engineer and UI/Ul with five years of experience building high-performing web applications with React, Next.js, and
TypeScript, coupled with a passion for leveraging Al tools to solve real-world problems. Proven ability to learn quickly,
collaborate effectively, and deliver innovative solutions, demonstrated through full-stack projects and design system
contributions.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
details:
Tasked with engineering high-fidelity prototypes and implementing user-
centric payment solutions for Stratcol's client platform. Responsible for building
and integrating frontend applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and Zustand.

Develop interactive, high-fidelity prototypes for new "Debit Order" and "Card
Payment" user flows using Next.js and TailwindCSS, based on detailed Figma
designs to validate UX concepts before full-scale implementation.

Engineer the frontend integration with Stratcol's back-end services,
implementing complex state management with Zustand and ensuring type
safety with TypeScript for all payment process enhancements.

Actively improve the development lifecycle by translating Figma designs into
production-ready components, working closely with back-end engineers to
define API contracts and ensure seamless data flow.

Collaborate daily with the Stratcol management team to align technical
strategy with business objectives, translating high-level requirements into
functional Figma designs and Next.js prototypes.

experience.title: Software Web Developer & UI Designer
details:
Built and launched innovative Al tools from concept to completion, including
podslice.ai and airesumegen.com, showcasing a robust set of full-stack
development skills and a strong aptitude for product innovation.

Designed and developed high-performance Jamstack websites for various
clients, leveraging modern React.js frameworks like Gatsby and Next.js to
significantly enhance user experience and performance.

Engineered secure and engaging user experiences, implementing security-first
principles such as Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to fortify client-side
applications.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
details:
Designed and developed new features for the AUTOPV platform, working
directly with back-end and UX/UI teams, leveraging React and TypeScript to
build a feature-rich software system.

Identified and resolved a critical vulnerability in the front-end architecture,
replacing a complex setup with a more maintainable architecture, resulting in
decreased AWS service expenses.

Actively contributed to code reviews and mentored junior developers, fostering
a culture of continuous improvement and collaboration.

experience.title: Frontend Software Engineer
details:
Led the front-end team in creating core product features for Ditto Hire,
focusing on enhancing development efficiency and design consistency.

Streamlined the development workflow by integrating tools like Figma, Zeplin,
Storybook, and Next.js, facilitating efficient translation of designs into code.

Led a front-end team of two remote engineers, fostering collaboration and
growth, and mentored a new Product designer in design system creation.

experience.title: User Experience Engineer
details:
Supported Capitec's mobile banking application, gaining experience with HTML,
CSS, JavaScript, and the Kendo Ul library.

Developed UX/UI components and accessibility scripts for visually impaired
users, ensuring a more inclusive user experience.

Gained hands-on experience in a large-scale, enterprise application within an
Agile Scrum environment.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
details:
Maintained and fixed code on a complex internal application for a prominent
international client, applying foundational React.js and JavaScript skills.

Developed and published a progressive internal design system library,
gatekeeper-ds, using the Figma Web API to generate styling elements for
standardized use across projects.

Collaborated with a senior developer, gaining valuable knowledge and
mentorship while contributing to the project.

experience.title: HTML/CSS UI Engineer
details:
Contributed to the conceptualization, design, development, and scaling of
several dynamic websites, ensuring successful project builds and launches.

Developed responsive and scalable front-end solutions for multiple dynamic
websites, using modern web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and
jQuery.

Collaborated directly with the Head of Design to ensure user-centered and
aesthetically pleasing interfaces, providing key advisory support throughout
the design process.
